stam.nurbs

Functions

evaluate(surf, x, y)

Evaluate NURBS surface at a specific set of coordinates.

tracks2surf(tracks, param[, delta, xparam, ...])

Compute a NURBS surface from a set of stellar evolution tracks, using the geomdl package.
